backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 全图默认背景，支持rgba，默认为无，透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The background color or gradient for the outer chart area. Support rgba and defaults to null, transprent.

color.descriptionCN: 数值系列的颜色列表，可配数组，eg：['#87cefa', 'rgba(123,123,123,0.5)','...']，当系列数量个数比颜色列表长度大时将循环选取
color.descriptionEN: List of color for the array series, possible array is: ['#87cefa', 'rgba(123,123,123,0.5)','...']. When there are more series than colors in the list, new colors are pulled from the start again.

renderAsImage.descriptionCN: 非IE8-支持渲染为图片非IE8-支持渲染为图片，可设为true或指定图片格式（png | jpeg），渲染为图片后实例依然可用（如setOption，resize等），但各种交互失效
renderAsImage.descriptionEN: Allows rendering as image in any browser but IE8-.supports render as image in non-IE8- browsers, can be set to true or specify image formats (png | jpeg). After rendered as image, the instance is still available (such as setOption, resize, etc.), but its various interactions will become invalid.

calculable.descriptionCN: 是否启用拖拽重计算特性，默认关闭，相关的还有 calculableColor， calculableHolderColor， nameConnector， valueConnector）
calculable.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the drag-recalculate feature will be enabled. Defaults to false. (See calculable, and other related properties like calculableColor, calculableHolderColor, nameConnector, valueConnector).

animation.descriptionCN: 是否启用图表初始化动画，默认开启，建议IE8-关闭
animation.descriptionEN: specifies whether the initial animation will be enabled, defaults to true. It is suggested to disable the initial animation in IE8-

timeline.descriptionCN: 时间轴，每个图表最多仅有一个时间轴控件
timeline.descriptionEN: Timeline, at most one timeline control is allowed in one chart.

title.descriptionCN: 标题，每个图表最多仅有一个标题控件
title.descriptionEN: Title, at most one title control is allowed in one chart.

toolbox.descriptionCN: 工具箱，每个图表最多仅有一个工具箱
toolbox.descriptionEN: Toolbox, at most one toolbox is allowed in one chart.

tooltip.descriptionCN: 提示框，鼠标悬浮交互时的信息提示
tooltip.descriptionEN: Tooltip,  A small "hover box" with detailed information about the item being hovered over.

legend.descriptionCN: 图例，每个图表最多仅有一个图例，混搭图表共享
legend.descriptionEN: Legend, at most one legend is allowed in one single/combination chart.

dataZoom.descriptionCN: 数据区域缩放,数据展现范围选择

roamController.descriptionCN: 漫游缩放组件,搭配地图使用
roamController.descriptionEN: zoom and roam controller, use for the map.

grid.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系内绘图网格
grid.descriptionEN: A network of regularly spaced lines on a Cartesian coordinate system.

xAxis.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系中横轴数组，数组中每一项代表一条横轴坐标轴，标准（1.0）中规定最多同时存在2条横轴
xAxis.descriptionEN: The horizontal axis array of a two-dimensional plot in Cartesian coordinates, and each item in the array represents one horizontal axis. According to Standard (1.0), at most two horizontal axes are allowed in one chart.

yAxis.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系中纵轴数组，数组中每一项代表一条纵轴坐标轴，标准（1.0）中规定最多同时存在2条纵轴
yAxis.descriptionEN: The vertical axis array of a two-dimensional plot in Cartesian coordinates, and each item in the array represents one vertical axis. According to Standard (1.0), at most two vertical axes are allowed in one chart.

series.descriptionCN: 驱动图表生成的数据内容，数组中每一项代表一个系列的特殊选项及数据
series.descriptionEN: The data array generated by data-driven chart. Each item in the array stands for a series' options and data.

symbolList.descriptionCN: 默认标志图形类型列表，循环使用
symbolList.descriptionEN: An array containing the default symbols. When all symbols are used, new symbols are pulled from the start again

calculableColor.descriptionCN: 拖拽重计算提示边框颜色

nameConnector.descriptionCN: 数据合并名字间连接符
nameConnector.descriptionEN: a connector that links the names of data seriestogether after the combination of data series

valueConnector.descriptionCN: 数据合并名字与数值间连接符
valueConnector.descriptionEN: a connector that links the name of data series with value when island appears after the combination of data series

addDataAnimation.descriptionCN: 是否启用动态数据接口动画效果，默认开启，建议IE8-关闭
addDataAnimation.descriptionEN: specifies whether the dynamic data interface animation will be enabled, defaults to true. It is suggested to disable animation in IE8-

animationThreshold.descriptionCN: 动画元素阀值，产生的图形原素超过2000不出动画，默认开启，建议IE8-关闭
animationThreshold.descriptionEN: threshold of animated elements. No animation if the graphic elements generated are over 2500. It is suggested to disable animation in IE8-.

animationDuration.descriptionEN: duration of the enter animation, in ms.

animationDurationUpdate.descriptionEN: duration of the update animation, in ms.

animationEasing.descriptionCN:
主元素的缓动效果，详见zrender.animation.easing，可选有：
'Linear',
'QuadraticIn', 'QuadraticOut', 'QuadraticInOut',
'CubicIn', 'CubicOut', 'CubicInOut',
'QuarticIn', 'QuarticOut', 'QuarticInOut',
'QuinticIn', 'QuinticOut', 'QuinticInOut',
'SinusoidalIn', 'SinusoidalOut', 'SinusoidalInOut',
'ExponentialIn', 'ExponentialOut', 'ExponentialInOut',
'CircularIn', 'CircularOut', 'CircularInOut',
'ElasticIn', 'ElasticOut', 'ElasticInOut',
'BackIn', 'BackOut', 'BackInOut',
'BounceIn', 'BounceOut', 'BounceInOut'
animationEasing.descriptionEN:
easing effect of the main element. Supports multi-level control. Seezrender.animation.easing, Possible values are:
'Linear',
'QuadraticIn', 'QuadraticOut', 'QuadraticInOut',
'CubicIn', 'CubicOut', 'CubicInOut',
'QuarticIn', 'QuarticOut', 'QuarticInOut',
'QuinticIn', 'QuinticOut', 'QuinticInOut',
'SinusoidalIn', 'SinusoidalOut', 'SinusoidalInOut',
'ExponentialIn', 'ExponentialOut', 'ExponentialInOut',
'CircularIn', 'CircularOut', 'CircularInOut',
'ElasticIn', 'ElasticOut', 'ElasticInOut',
'BackIn', 'BackOut', 'BackInOut',
'BounceIn', 'BounceOut', 'BounceInOut'

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show timeline. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

type.descriptionCN: 模式是时间类型，时间轴间隔根据时间跨度自动计算，可选为：'number'
type.descriptionEN: When the type is time, interval of the timeline is calculated based on the time span. Can also be: 'number'.

notMerge.descriptionCN: 时间轴上多个option切换时是否进行merge操作，同setOption第二个参数（详见实例方法）
notMerge.descriptionEN: Whether to merge the options for timeline When called multiple times, same as the second parameter of setOption. (See Instance Methods).

realtime.descriptionCN: 拖拽或点击改变时间轴是否实时显示，在不支持Canvas的浏览器中该值自动强制置为false
realtime.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the chart will be displayed in real time when you drag or click the timeline. Default to false (CAN NOT be changed) in the explorer which does't support canvas, such as IE6/7/8.

x.descriptionCN: 时间轴左上角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x.descriptionEN: Set abscissa on the upper left corner of the timeline in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y.descriptionCN: 时间轴左上角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），默认无，随y2定位，如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y.descriptionEN: Set ordinate on the upper left corner of the timeline in px, or in percent (string). Defaults to null. The position varies with y2, such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

x2.descriptionCN: 时间轴右下角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x2.descriptionEN: Set abscissa on the lower right corner of the timeline in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y2.descriptionCN: 时间轴右下角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y2.descriptionEN: Set ordinate on the lower right corner of the timeline in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

width.descriptionCN:
时间轴宽度，默认为总宽度 - x - x2，数值单位px，指定width后将忽略x2。见下图。
支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的宽度)
width.descriptionEN:
Width of the timeline, defaults to the total width - x - x2, in px, ignore x2 after specifying width. See the image below.
Can also be set in percent (string), such as '50%' (half the width of the display area).

height.descriptionCN: 时间轴高度，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的高度)
height.descriptionEN: Height of the timeline, in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (half the height of the display area).

backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the background. Defaults to transparent.

padding.descriptionCN: 内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

controlPosition.descriptionCN: 播放控制器位置，可选为：'left' | 'right' | 'none'
controlPosition.descriptionEN: The position of play controller. Valid values are: 'left' | 'right' | 'none'

loop.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to play in a loop.

lineStyle.descriptionCN: 时间轴轴线样式，lineStyle控制线条样式
lineStyle.descriptionEN: Sets the line style of the timeline.

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示时间轴标签文本
show.descriptionEN: specifies whether to show

interval.descriptionCN: 挑选间隔，默认为'auto'，可选为：'auto'（自动隐藏显示不下的） | 0（全部显示） | {number}
interval.descriptionEN: sets interval. Defaults to 'auto'. Valid values are: 'auto' (automatically hide those that cannot be displayed) | 0 (unhide all) | {number}

rotate.descriptionCN: 旋转角度，默认为0，不旋转，正值为逆时针，负值为顺时针，可选为：-90 ~ 90
rotate.descriptionEN: the angle of rotation, defaults to 0 (not rotate). Positive value for counterclockwise rotation, negative value for clockwise rotation. Valid values are: -90 ~ 90

checkpointStyle.descriptionCN:
时间轴当前点

symbol : 当前点symbol，默认随轴上的symbol
symbolSize : 当前点symbol大小，默认随轴上symbol大小
color : 当前点symbol颜色，默认为随当前点颜色，可指定具体颜色，如无则为'#1e90ff'
borderColor ： 当前点symbol边线颜色
borderWidth ： 当前点symbol边线宽度
label同上
checkpointStyle.descriptionEN:
timeline checkpoint

symbol: symbol of the checkpoint, defaults to the symbol on timeline.
symbolSize: size of the checkpoint symbol, defaults to the size of symbol on timeline.
color: color of the checkpoint symbol, defaults to the color of the checkpoint. A specific color can be specified; If unspecified, defaults to '#1e90ff'.
borderColor: the color of the checkpoint symbol border.
borderWidth: the width of the checkpoint symbol border.
label: see above.

symbol.descriptionEN: symbol of the checkpoint, defaults to the symbol on timeline.

symbolSize.descriptionCN: 当前点symbol大小，默认随轴上symbol大小
symbolSize.descriptionEN: size of the checkpoint symbol, defaults to the size of symbol on timeline. color: color of the checkpoint symbol, defaults to the color of the checkpoint. A specific color can be specified; If unspecified, defaults to '#1e90ff'

color.descriptionCN: 当前点symbol颜色，默认为随当前点颜色
color.descriptionEN: color of the checkpoint symbol, defaults to the color of the checkpoint. A specific color can be specified;

borderColor.descriptionEN: the color of the checkpoint symbol border

borderWidth.descriptionEN: the width of the checkpoint symbol border

controlStyle.descriptionCN: 时间轴控制器样式，可指定itemSize按钮大小，itemGap按钮间隔，normal.color正常和emphasis.color高亮颜色
controlStyle.descriptionEN: the style of timeline controller. ItemSize, itemGap and both normal and highlight color can be specified.

symbol.descriptionEN: the symbol for timeline tick, same as serie.symbol.

symbolSize.descriptionEN: size of the symbol for timeline tick, same as serie.symbolSize.

currentIndex.descriptionCN: 当前索引位置，对应options数组，用于指定显示特定系列
currentIndex.descriptionEN: The current index position, corresponding to options array, used to display a specific series.

data.descriptionCN: 时间轴列表，同时也是轴label内容
data.descriptionEN: timeline list, also the timeline label content.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show timeline. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

text.descriptionEN: title text, '\n' represents a line feed.

target.descriptionCN: 指定窗口打开主标题超链接，支持'self' | 'blank'，不指定等同为'blank'（新窗口）
target.descriptionEN: Specifies a window to open the title hyperlink. Can be one of 'self' | 'blank'. If unspecified, equal to 'blank' (a new window).

subtext.descriptionEN: subtitle text, '\n' represents a line feed.

subtarget.descriptionCN: 指定窗口打开副标题超链接，支持'self' | 'blank'，不指定等同为'blank'（新窗口）
subtarget.descriptionEN: Specifies a window to open the subtitle hyperlink. Can be one of 'self' | 'blank'. If unspecified, equal to 'blank' (a new window).

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为左侧，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to left. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图顶端，可选为：'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to top. Valid values are: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

textAlign.descriptionCN: 水平对齐方式，默认根据x设置自动调整，可选为： left' | 'right' | 'center
textAlign.descriptionEN: horizontal alignment. It is further determined by the x option by default. Valid values are: left' | 'right' | 'center.

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 标题背景颜色，默认透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the title's background. Defaults to transparent.

borderColor.descriptionEN: The color of the drawn border around the title.

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 标题边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）
borderWidth.descriptionEN: The width of the drawn border around the title, in px, defaults to 0 (no border).

padding.descriptionCN: 标题内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding of the title, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

itemGap.descriptionCN: 主副标题纵向间隔，单位px，默认为10
itemGap.descriptionEN: The vertical gap between each item in the title/subtitle, in px, defaults to 10.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show toolbox. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

orient.descriptionCN: 布局方式，默认为水平布局，可选为：'horizontal' | 'vertical'
orient.descriptionEN: layout manner. Defaults to horizontal. Valid values are: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图顶端，可选为：'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to top. Valid values are: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 工具箱背景颜色，默认透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the toolbox's background. Defaults to transparent.

borderColor.descriptionEN: The color of the drawn border around the toolbox.

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 工具箱边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）
borderWidth.descriptionEN: The width of the drawn border around the toolbox, in px, defaults to 0 (no border).

padding.descriptionCN: 工具箱内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding of the toolbox, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

itemGap.descriptionCN: 各个item之间的间隔，单位px，默认为10，横向布局时为水平间隔，纵向布局时为纵向间隔，见下图
itemGap.descriptionEN: The pixel gap between each item. Defaults to 10. It is horizontal in a toolbox with horizontal layout, and vertical in a toolbox with vertical layout. See image below.

itemSize.descriptionEN: the size of toolbox icon, in px.

color.descriptionCN: 工具箱icon颜色序列，循环使用，同时支持在具体feature内指定color
color.descriptionEN: An array containing the default colors for the toolbox's icons. When all colors are used, new colors are pulled from the start again. Default colors can also be set on specific features.

showTitle.descriptionCN: 是否显示工具箱文字提示，默认启用
showTitle.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the toolbox text will be showed. Defaults to true.

textStyle.descriptionEN: the style of toolbox text, (See textStyle).

feature.descriptionCN: 启用功能，目前支持feature见下，工具箱自定义功能回调处理，try this »
feature.descriptionEN: Currently toolbox supports all the features listed below. For custom features, try this »

mark.descriptionCN: 辅助线标志，上图icon左数1/2/3，分别是启用，删除上一条，删除全部，可设置更多属性
mark.descriptionEN: markLine icons. In the picture above, the first, second, and third icons from the left respectively represent markLine switch, undo markLine, and clear markLine. You can set more properties.

dataZoom.descriptionCN: 框选区域缩放，自动与存在的dataZoom控件同步，上图icon左数4/5，分别是启用，缩放后退
dataZoom.descriptionEN: dataZoom icons. Automatically synchronized with the dataZoom control. In the picture above, the fourth and fifth icons from the left respectively represent data zoom and data zoom reset.

dataView.descriptionCN: 数据视图，上图icon左数6，打开数据视图，可设置更多属性
dataView.descriptionEN: dataView icon. In the picture above, the third icon from the right represents dataView, where You can set more properties.

readOnly.descriptionCN: readOnly 默认数据视图为只读，可指定readOnly为false打开编辑功能
readOnly.descriptionEN: dataView is set to read-only by default. It can be edited when readOnly is false.

optionToContent.descriptionCN: 自主编排数据视图的显示内容

contentToOption.descriptionCN: 当数据视图readOnly为false时，会出现刷新按钮，如果是自主编排的显示内容，如何翻转也请自理
contentToOption.descriptionEN: When the readOnly of dataView is set to false, the refresh button will appear. You can set the content and the way to display it yourself if you want.

lang.descriptionCN: 数据视图上有三个话术，默认是['数据视图', '关闭', '刷新']，如需改写，可自定义
lang.descriptionEN: DataView has three default texts: ['Data View', 'close', 'refresh'], you can change it if you want.

magicType.descriptionCN: 动态类型切换，支持直角系下的折线图、柱状图、堆积、平铺转换，上图icon左数6~14，分别是切换为堆积，切换为平铺，切换折线图，切换柱形图，切换为力导向布局图，切换为和弦图，切换为饼图，切换为漏斗图
magicType.descriptionEN: magicType icons. So far magicType supports switch between bar and line, stack and tile. In the picture above, the sixth, seventh, eighth and ninth icons from the left respectively represent switch to stack, tile, line, bar, force, chord, pie and funnel.

option.descriptionCN: 可传入切换是动态修改的配置，将复写series内的数组项
option.descriptionEN: Series' option can be dynamically changed at the time of magic switch.

restore.descriptionCN: 还原，复位原始图表，上图icon右数2
restore.descriptionEN: restore icon. In the picture above, the second icon from the right represents restore the chart.

saveAsImage.descriptionCN: 保存图片（IE8-不支持），上图icon最右，可设置更多属性
saveAsImage.descriptionEN: saveAsImage icon. In the picture above, the first icon from the right represents save as image(not supported on IE8-), where You can set more properties.

type.descriptionCN: 默认保存图片类型为'png'，需改为'jpeg'
type.descriptionEN: the default type to save image is 'png', change it to 'jpeg'.

name.descriptionCN: 指定图片名称，如不指定，则用图表title标题，如无title标题则图片名称默认为“ECharts”
name.descriptionEN: specifies name of the image. If unspecified, use the chart title. If there is no title, defaults to “ECharts”.

lang.descriptionCN: 非IE浏览器支持点击下载，有保存话术，默认是“点击保存”，可修改
lang.descriptionEN: you can click to save it in non-IE browsers. Save text is supported. Defaults to “click Save”, can be changed.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show tooltip. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

showContent.descriptionCN:
tooltip主体内容显示策略，只需tooltip触发事件或显示axisPointer而不需要显示内容时可配置该项为false，
可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
showContent.descriptionEN:
Specifies whether to show the content of tooltip. Set it to false when you just need the tooltip to trigger events or show axisPointer.
. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

trigger.descriptionCN: 触发类型，默认数据触发，见下图，可选为：'item' | 'axis'
trigger.descriptionEN: Type of trigger. Defaults to 'item'. See image below. Valid values are: 'item' | 'axis'.

position.descriptionCN: 位置指定，传入{Array}，如[x, y]， 固定位置[x, y]；传入{Function}，如function([x, y]) {return [newX,newY]}，默认显示坐标为输入参数，用户指定的新坐标为输出返回。
position.descriptionEN: Specifies position, pass in {Array}, like [x, y], fixed position [x, y]; pass in {Function}, like function([x, y]) {return [newX,newY]}. The default displayed coordinates are input parameters, the new user-specified coordinates are output return values.

formatter.descriptionCN:
内容格式器：{string}（Template） | {Function}，支持异步回调见表格下方
  • {string}，模板（Template），其变量为：
    • {a} | {a0}
    • {b} | {b0}
    • {c} | {c0}
    • {d} | {d0} （部分图表类型无此项）
    • {e} | {e0} （部分图表类型无此项）
    • 多值下则存在多套{a1}, {b1}, {c1}, {d1}, {a2}, {b2}, {c2}, {d2}, ...
    • 其中变量a、b、c、d在不同图表类型下代表数据含义为：
      • 折线（区域）图、柱状（条形）图、K线图 : a（系列名称），b（类目值），c（数值）, d（无）
      • 散点图（气泡）图 : a（系列名称），b（数据名称），c（数值数组）, d（无）
      • 地图 : a（系列名称），b（区域名称），c（合并数值）, d（无）
      • 饼图、雷达图、仪表盘、漏斗图: a（系列名称），b（数据项名称），c（数值）, d（饼图：百分比 | 雷达图：指标名称）
      • 力导向图, 和弦图 :
        • 节点 : a（系列名称），b（节点名称），c（节点值）, d(节点类目索引)
        • 边 : a（系列名称），b（边名称，默认为大端节点名称-小端节点名称），c（link.value）, d(大端节点 name 或者 index), e(小端节点 name 或者 index)
  • {Function}，传递参数列表为[params, ticket, callback]，详见下：
    • params : 数组内容同模板变量，
      [
    {

        seriesIndex: 0,
        seriesName: '一周销量',
        name: '周一',
        dataIndex: 0,
        data: data,
        name: name,
        value: value,
        percent: special,       // 饼图
        indicator: special,     // 雷达图、力导向、和弦
        value2: special2,       // 力导向、和弦
        indicator2: special2    // 力导向、和弦
    },
    {..},
    ...
]
    • ticket : 异步回调标识
    • callback : 异步回调，回调时需要两个参数，第一个为前面提到的ticket，第二个为填充内容html
    • *函数回调时this指针指向当前图表实例（myChart）
formatter.descriptionEN:
content formatter: {string} (Template) | {Function}. Supports asynchronous callback. See below.
  • {string}, Template, its variables are:
    • {a} | {a0}
    • {b} | {b0}
    • {c} | {c0}
    • {d} | {d0} (some chart types do not have this variable)
    • {e} | {e0} (some chart types do not have this variable)
    • If there are multiple sets of data, there will be multiple sets of varaibles accordingly, like {a1}, {b1}, {c1}, {d1}, {a2}, {b2}, {c2}, {d2}, ...
    • Here are what variable a, b, c and d reprensent in different chart types:
      • line & area, column & bar, candlestick: a (series name), b(category value), c (value), d(null)
      • scatter & bubble: a (series name), b (data name), c (value array), d(null)
      • map: a (series name), b (area name), c(merged value), d(null)
      • pie, radar, gauge, funnel: a (series name), b (data item name)，c(value), d (pie: percent | radar: indicator name)
      • force, chord :
        • node : a (series name)，b (node name)，c (node value), d (node index), e
        • link : a (series name)，b (link name, default bigEndNodeName-smallEndNodeName)，c(link.value), d(name or index of big end node), e(name or index of small end node)
  • {Function}, the list of parameters passed in is [params, ticket, callback], detail as follows:
    • params : array content and template varaibles are the same
      [
    {

        seriesIndex: 0,
        seriesName: 'Sales',
        name: 'Monday',
        dataIndex: 0,
        data: data,
        name: name,
        value: value,
        percent: special,       // pie
        indicator: special,     // radar, force, chord
        value2: special2,       // force, chord
        indicator2: special2    // force, chord
    },
    {..},
    ...
]
    • ticket: asynchronous callback marker
    • callback: asynchronous callback, the callback needs two parameters, the first one is the ticket that we mentioned earlier, the second is the fill content html.
    • * When the function callbacks, 'this' pointer points to the current chart instance (myChart).

islandFormatter.descriptionCN: 拖拽重计算独有，数据孤岛内容格式器：{string}（Template） | {Function}，见表格下方
islandFormatter.descriptionEN: island content formatter. For Drag-Recalculate only: {string} (Template) | {Function}. See below.

showDelay.descriptionCN: 显示延迟，添加显示延迟可以避免频繁切换，特别是在详情内容需要异步获取的场景，单位ms
showDelay.descriptionEN: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is shown when the mouse moves across a point or chart. Placing a delay on a tooltip before it is displayed can prevent frequent switch, especially when the tooltip text is requested asynchronously.

hideDelay.descriptionEN: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

transitionDuration.descriptionCN: 动画变换时长，单位s，如果你希望tooltip的跟随实时响应，showDelay设置为0是关键，同时transitionDuration设0也会有交互体验上的差别。
transitionDuration.descriptionEN: The duration in seconds of the animated transition. If you want the tooltip to follow the mouse as it moves across a point or chart, setting showDelay to 0 is the key, but setting transitionDuration to 0 can also make a difference in interactive experiences.

enterable.descriptionCN: 鼠标是否可进入详情气泡中，默认为false，如需详情内交互，如添加链接，按钮，可设置为true。
enterable.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to let the mouse go into the tip dom, default to false. Let it be true if you need interaction like link | button etc.

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 提示背景颜色，默认为透明度为0.7的黑色
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The background color for the tooltip. Defaults to a black color (opacity to 30%).

borderColor.descriptionEN: The color of the tooltip border.

borderRadius.descriptionCN: 提示边框圆角，单位px，默认为4
borderRadius.descriptionEN: The radius of the rounded border corners, in px, defaults to 4.

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 提示边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）
borderWidth.descriptionEN: The pixel width of the tooltip border, defaults to 0 (no border).

padding.descriptionCN: 提示内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding of the tooltip, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css.

axisPointer.descriptionCN:
坐标轴指示器，默认type为line，可选为：'line' | 'cross' | 'shadow' | 'none'(无)，指定type后对应style生效，见下
lineStyle设置直线指示器（详见lineStyle）,
crossStyle设置十字准星指示器（详见lineStyle）,
shadowStyle设置阴影指示器（详见shadowStyle），areaStyle.size默认为'auto'自动计算，可指定具体宽度
axisPointer.descriptionEN:
axis pointer, triggered by axis. Default type is line. Valid types are: 'line' | 'cross' | 'shadow' | 'none'. Each type has its corresponding style, see below.
lineStyle: style for line pointer, (see lineStyle),
crossStyle: style for crosshairs pointer, (see crossStyle),
shadowStyle: style for shadow pointer, (see shadowStyle, areaStyle. Size is set to 'auto' by default. Width can be specified.

type.descriptionCN: 可选值：'line' | 'cross' | 'shadow' | 'none'(无)，指定type后对应style生效（如下）
type.descriptionEN: Possible value: 'line' | 'cross' | 'shadow' | 'none'. Each type has its corresponding style, see below.

textStyle.descriptionCN: 文本样式，默认为白色字体
textStyle.descriptionEN: style for the tooltip text. Defaults to white.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

orient.descriptionCN: 布局方式，默认为水平布局，可选为：'horizontal' | 'vertical'
orient.descriptionEN: layout manner, defaults to horizontal. Valid values are: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图顶端，可选为：'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to top. Valid values are: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 图例背景颜色，默认透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the legend's background. Defaults to transparent.

borderColor.descriptionEN: The color of the drawn border around the legend.

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 图例边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）
borderWidth.descriptionEN: The width of the drawn border around the legend, in px, defaults to 0 (no border).

padding.descriptionCN: 图例内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding of the legend, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

itemGap.descriptionCN: 各个item之间的间隔，单位px，默认为10，横向布局时为水平间隔，纵向布局时为纵向间隔，见下图
itemGap.descriptionEN: The pixel gap between each item. Defaults to 10. It is horizontal in a legend with horizontal layout, and vertical in a legend with vertical layout. See image below.

textStyle.descriptionCN: 默认只设定了图例文字颜色 ，更个性化的是，要指定文字颜色跟随图例，可设color为'auto'
textStyle.descriptionEN: We only set the default color of legend text. If you want the legend text to take the color of the legend, you can set color to 'auto'.

formatter.descriptionCN: 文本格式器：{string}（Template） | {Function}，模板变量为'{name}'，函数回调参数为name
formatter.descriptionEN: text formatter: {string} (Template) | {Function}, template variable is '{name}', function paramater is name.

selectedMode.descriptionCN: 选择模式，默认开启图例开关，可选single，multiple
selectedMode.descriptionEN: selection mode. Enable legend switch by default. Can be one of: single, multiple

selected.descriptionCN: 配置默认选中状态，可配合LEGEND.SELECTED事件做动态数据载入，try this »
selected.descriptionEN: The default selected state, can be used to conduct dynamic data loading with LEGEND.SELECTED event, try this »

data.descriptionCN:
图例内容数组，数组项通常为{string}，每一项代表一个系列的name，默认布局到达边缘会自动分行（列），传入空字符串''可实现手动分行（列）。
使用根据该值索引series中同名系列所用的图表类型和itemStyle，如果索引不到，该item将默认为没启用状态。
如需个性化图例文字样式，可把数组项改为{Object}，指定文本样式和个性化图例icon，格式为
{
name : {string},
textStyle : {Object},
icon : {string}
}
data.descriptionEN:
legend content array, the array items are usually {string}, each item represents a series name, auto line break in layout, but you can specify a '' for a new line break.
Use the value to index the chart type and itemStyle used by series with the same name in series. If fails, the item will be in not enabled state by default.
If you need custom legend text style, you can change the array item to {Object}. With text style and custom icon, the format is:
{
name : {string},
textStyle : {Object},
icon : {string}
}

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

orient.descriptionCN: 布局方式，默认为垂直布局，可选为：'horizontal' | 'vertical'
orient.descriptionEN: layout manner. Defaults to vertical. Valid values are: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为全图左对齐，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to left. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图底部，可选为：'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to bottom. Valid values are: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 值域控件背景颜色，默认透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the dataRange's background. Defaults to transparent.

borderColor.descriptionEN: The color of the drawn border around the dataRange.

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 值域控件边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）
borderWidth.descriptionEN: The width of the drawn border around the dataRange, in px, defaults to 0 (no border).

padding.descriptionCN: 值域控件内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding of the dataRange, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

itemGap.descriptionCN: 各个item之间的间隔，单位px，默认为10，横向布局时为水平间隔，纵向布局时为纵向间隔，见下图
itemGap.descriptionEN: The pixel gap between each item. Defaults to 10. It is horizontal in the dataRange with horizontal layout, and vertical in the dataRange with vertical layout. See image below.

min.descriptionCN: 指定的最小值，eg: 0，默认无，必须参数，唯有指定了splitList时可缺省min。
min.descriptionEN: The specified minimum value, such as 0. Defaults to null. Required parameter. Only when splitList is used, min can be ignored.

max.descriptionCN: 指定的最大值，eg: 100，默认无，必须参数，唯有指定了splitList时可缺省max
max.descriptionEN: The specified maximum value, such as 100. Defaults to null. Required parameter. Only when splitList is used, max can be ignored.

precision.descriptionCN: 小数精度，默认为0，无小数点，当 min ~ max 间在当前精度下无法整除splitNumber份时，精度会自动提高以满足均分，不支持不等划分
precision.descriptionEN: Decimal precision. Defaults to 0 (no decimal point). If the value of max - min is not divisible by splitNumber in the existing precision, the precision will be automatically increased for the sake of exact division. Inexact division is not supported.

splitNumber.descriptionCN: 分割段数，默认为5，为0时为线性渐变，calculable为true是默认均分100份
splitNumber.descriptionEN: the number of segments. Defaults to 5. Linear gradient when set to 0. When calculable is true, it is equally split into 100 parts by default.

splitList.descriptionCN:
自定义分割方式，支持不等距分割。splitList被指定时，splitNumber将被忽略。
splitList是一个（不可为空的）Array，Array的每一项为一个Object，含有如下属性：
{
start: 10 本项的数据范围起点（>=），如果不设置表示负无穷。
end: 30 本项的数据范围终点（<=），如果不设置表示正无穷。
如果想本项只对应一个值，那么start和end设同样的数就可以了。
label: '10 to 30' 本项的显示标签，缺省则自动生成label
color: '#333' 本项的颜色，缺省则自动计算color
}
详见例子 this 》
splitList.descriptionEN:
Customizing that how to split dataRange. When splitList is specified, splitNumber is ignored.
splitList is an Array, which can not be empty. Each item of the Array is Object like:
{
start: 10 The start of the domain of this item.
end: 30 The end of the domain of this item.
'start' and 'end' can be set to the same value,
in which case this item is coresponding to the single value rather than an interval.
label: '10 to 30' text label of this item. If ignoring this attribute, Text label will be auto generated.
color: '#333' Color of this item. If ignoring attribute, color can be auto generated.
}
example: this 》

range.descriptionCN:
用于设置dataRange的初始选中范围。calculable为true时有效。
其值型如：{start: 10, end: 50}。
range.descriptionEN:
This option is used to set the initial selected range of dataRange. This option works when "calculable" is true.
The value of this option likes: {start: 10, end: 50}

selectedMode.descriptionCN: 选择模式，默认开启值域开关，可选single，multiple
selectedMode.descriptionEN: selection mode. Enable dataRange switch by default. Can be one of: single, multiple

calculable.descriptionCN: 是否启用值域漫游，启用后无视splitNumber和splitList，值域显示为线性渐变
calculable.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the scale roaming feature will be enabled. When enabled, ignore splitNumber and splitList, dataRange shows as linear gradient.

hoverLink.descriptionCN: 是否启用地图hover时的联动响应（详情披露）

realtime.descriptionCN: 值域漫游是否实时显示，在不支持Canvas的浏览器中该值自动强制置为false。
realtime.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the scale roaming feature will be displayed in real time. Default to false (CAN NOT be changed) in the explorer which does't support canvas, such as IE6/7/8.

color.descriptionCN: 值域颜色标识，颜色数组长度必须>=2，颜色代表从数值高到低的变化，即颜色数组低位代表数值高的颜色标识 ，支持Alpha通道上的变化（rgba）
color.descriptionEN: color list of the dataRange. Length of the color array must be > = 2. The color shows the change from high value to low value; that is, the low color array represents the high value color. Alpha ( rgba ) is supported.

formatter.descriptionCN: 内容格式器：{string}（Template） | {Function}，模板变量为'{value}'和'{value2}'，代表数值起始值和结束值，函数参数两个，含义同模板变量，当calculable为true时模板变量仅有'{value}'，try this »
formatter.descriptionEN: content formatter：{string} (Template) | {Function}, the template's variables are {value}' and '{value2}', which stand for start value ​​and end value. There are two function parameters, whose meanings are the same as template variables. One parameter '{value}' only when calculable is true. Try this »

text.descriptionCN: 值域文字显示，splitNumber生效时默认以计算所得数值作为值域文字显示，可指定长度为2的文本数组显示简介的值域文本，如['高', '低']，'\n'指定换行
text.descriptionEN: text of the dataRange, when splitNumber is valid, defaults to the calculated value. You can specify a text array with the length of 2 to show the brief dataRange text, like ['high', 'low']. '\n' represents a line feed.

textStyle.descriptionCN: 默认只设定了值域控件文字颜色
textStyle.descriptionEN: We only set the default color of dataRange text.

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示，当show为true时则接管使用指定类目轴的全部系列数据，如不指定则接管全部直角坐标系数据。
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show dataZoom. If true, take over all the series of data using specified category axis. If unspecified, take over all the Cartesian coordinate system data.

orient.descriptionCN: 布局方式，默认为水平布局，可选为：'horizontal' | 'vertical'
orient.descriptionEN: layout manner, defaults to horizontal. Valid values are: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为根据grid参数适配，纵向布局默认左侧，可指定 {number}（左上角x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: Horizontal placement. By default it is adapted according to the grid's parameters. Vertical layout is left by default, can be specified. {number} (the x-coordinate, in pixels, of the upper-left corner.)

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为根据grid参数适配，纵向布局默认下方，可指定 {number}（左上角y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: Vertical placement. By default it is adapted according to the grid's parameters. Vertical layout is bottom by default, can be specified. {number} (the y-coordinate, in pixels, of the upper-left corner.)

width.descriptionCN: 指定宽度，横向布局时默认为根据grid参数适配，纵向布局是默认为30，可指定 {number}（宽度，单位px）
width.descriptionEN: Specifies width. In honrizontal layout, it is adapted according to the grid's parameters by default. In vertical layout, defaults to 30, can be specified. {number} (width, in px)

height.descriptionCN: 指定高度，纵向布局时默认为根据grid参数适配，横向布局是默认为30，可指定 {number}（高度，单位px）
height.descriptionEN: Specifies height. In vertical layout, it is adapted according to the grid's parameters by default. In honrizontal layout, defaults to 30, can be specified. {number} (height, in px)

backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the background. Defaults to transparent.

dataBackgroundColor.descriptionCN: 数据缩略背景颜色，仅以第一个系列的数据作为缩量图显示
dataBackgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the dataZoom's background. Only the first series would be rendered as data background.

fillerColor.descriptionEN: The fill color of the selected area.

handleColor.descriptionEN: The color of the control handle.

handleSize.descriptionEN: The size of the control handle.

xAxisIndex.descriptionCN: 当不指定时默认控制所有横向类目，可通过数组指定多个需要控制的横向类目坐标轴Index，仅一个时可直接为数字
xAxisIndex.descriptionEN: If unspecified, it controls by default all the x-axes. You can use array to specify multiple x-axes Index that needs to be controlled, and number to specify one x-axis Index that needs to be controlled.

yAxisIndex.descriptionCN: 当不指定时默认控制所有纵向类目，可通过数组指定多个需要控制的纵向类目坐标轴Index，仅一个时可直接为数字
yAxisIndex.descriptionEN: If unspecified, it controls by default all the y-axes. You can use array to specify multiple y-axes Index that needs to be controlled, and number to specify one y-axis Index that needs to be controlled.

start.descriptionCN: 数据缩放，选择起始比例，默认为0（%），从首个数据起选择。
start.descriptionEN: The start percent of dataZoom. Defaults to 0 (%), starts with the first data.

end.descriptionCN: 数据缩放，选择结束比例，默认为100（%），到最后一个数据选择结束。
end.descriptionEN: The end percent of dataZoom. Defaults to 100 (%), ends with the last data.

showDetail.descriptionCN: 缩放变化是否显示定位详情。

realtime.descriptionCN: 缩放变化是否实时显示，在不支持Canvas的浏览器中该值自动强制置为false。
realtime.descriptionEN: Specifies whether dataZoom will be displayed in real time. It is suggested to disable the realtime effect when your browser is slow or data sets are large and complex. Default to false (CAN NOT be changed) in the explorer which does't support canvas, such as IE6/7/8.

zoomLock.descriptionCN: 数据缩放锁，默认为false，当设置为true时选择区域不能伸缩，即(end - start)值保持不变，仅能做数据漫游。
zoomLock.descriptionEN: DataZoom lock. Defaults to false. When set to true, the selected area cannot be zoomed,  i.e. (end - start) value remains unchanged; only data roaming is applicable.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）。
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为左侧，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to left. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图顶端，可选为：'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to top. Valid values are: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'center' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

width.descriptionCN: 指定宽度，决定4向漫游圆盘大小，可指定 {number}（宽度，单位px）
width.descriptionEN: Specifies width which also define the size of the roam disk, can be {number}(in px)

height.descriptionCN: 指定高度，缩放控制键默认会在指定高度的最下方最大化显示，可指定 {number}（高度，单位px）
height.descriptionEN: Specifies height of the whold controller boundary box, the zoom button would be placed at the bottom, can be {number}(in px)

backgroundColor.descriptionCN: 缩放漫游组件背景颜色，默认透明
backgroundColor.descriptionEN: The color of the background. Defaults to transparent.

borderColor.descriptionCN: 缩放漫游组件边框颜色

borderWidth.descriptionCN: 缩放漫游组件边框线宽，单位px，默认为0（无边框）

padding.descriptionCN: 缩放漫游组件内边距，单位px，默认各方向内边距为5，接受数组分别设定上右下左边距，同css，见下图
padding.descriptionEN: The inner padding, in px, defaults to 5. Can be set as array - [top, right, bottom, left], same as css, see image below.

fillerColor.descriptionCN: 漫游组件文字填充颜色
fillerColor.descriptionEN: The fill color of the text in the controller.

handleColor.descriptionEN: The main color of the control handle.

step.descriptionEN: moving step of the 4 direction roam in px

mapTypeControl.descriptionCN:
必须，指定漫游组件可控地图类型，如：{ china: true }
当同一图表内同时呈现多个地图时，可以单独指定所需控制地图类型，如：{ china: false, '北京': true}
mapTypeControl.descriptionEN:
Required. Specifies the mapType which should be under control, as: { china: true }
You can specify every single mapType when multiple map in a chart at the same time, such as: { china: false, world: true}

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

x.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系内绘图网格左上角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x.descriptionEN: Set abscissa on the upper left corner of the grid in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系内绘图网格左上角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y.descriptionEN: Set ordinate on the upper left corner of the grid in px, or in percent (string). Defaults to null. The position varies with y2, such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

x2.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系内绘图网格右下角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x2.descriptionEN: Set abscissa on the lower right corner of the grid in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y2.descriptionCN: 直角坐标系内绘图网格右下角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y2.descriptionEN: Set ordinate on the lower right corner of the grid in px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

width.descriptionCN:
直角坐标系内绘图网格（不含坐标轴）宽度，默认为总宽度 - x - x2，数值单位px，指定width后将忽略x2，见下图。
支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的宽度)
width.descriptionEN:
Width of the grid (without axes), defaults to the total width - x - x2, in px, ignore x2 after specifying width. See the image below.
Can also be set in percent (string), such as '50%' (half the width of the display area).

height.descriptionCN:
直角坐标系内绘图网格（不含坐标轴）高度，默认为总高度 - y - y2，数值单位px，指定height后将忽略y2，见下图。
支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的高度)
height.descriptionEN:
Height of the grid (without axes), defaults to the total height - y - y2, in px, ignore y2 after specifying height. See the image below.
Can also be set in percent (string), such as '50%' (half the height of the display area).

oneOf.descriptionCN: 坐标轴类型，横轴默认为类目型'category'，纵轴默认为数值型'value'
oneOf.descriptionEN: type of the coordinate axis. By default, x-axis is 'category', y-axis is 'value'.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 坐标轴类型，横轴默认为类目型'category'，纵轴默认为数值型'value'
oneOf.descriptionEN: type of the coordinate axis. By default, x-axis is 'category', y-axis is 'value'.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 坐标轴类型，横轴默认为类目型'category'，纵轴默认为数值型'value'
oneOf.descriptionEN: type of the coordinate axis. By default, x-axis is 'category', y-axis is 'value'.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 坐标轴类型，横轴默认为类目型'category'，纵轴默认为数值型'value'
oneOf.descriptionEN: type of the coordinate axis. By default, x-axis is 'category', y-axis is 'value'.

show.descriptionCN: 显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show axis. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

name.descriptionEN: name of the value axis. Defaults to null.

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

position.descriptionCN: 坐标轴类型，横轴默认为类目型'bottom'，纵轴默认为数值型'left'，可选为：'bottom' | 'top' | 'left' | 'right'
position.descriptionEN: position of the coordinate axis. For x-axis ('category'), defaults to 'bottom'. For y-axis ('value'), defaults to 'left'. Valid values are: 'bottom' | 'top' | 'left' | 'right'.

nameLocation.descriptionCN: 坐标轴名称位置，默认为'end'，可选为：'start' | 'end'
nameLocation.descriptionEN: name location of the value axis. Defaults to 'end'. Valid values are: 'start' | 'end'.

nameTextStyle.descriptionCN: 坐标轴名称文字样式，默认取全局配置，颜色跟随axisLine主色，可设
nameTextStyle.descriptionEN: text style for the name of the value axis. Defaults to global options, takes the main color of axisLine. Can be specified.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 坐标轴两端空白策略，数组内数值代表百分比，[原始数据最小值与最终最小值之间的差额，原始数据最大值与最终最大值之间的差额]
oneOf.descriptionEN: blank border on each side of the axis. the value within the array represents percentage, [the difference between the original minimum value and the final minimum value, the difference between the original maximum value and the final maximum value].

oneOf.descriptionCN: 留白策略 ，true(留白)|false(不留白)

min.descriptionCN: 指定的最小值，eg: 0，默认无，会自动根据具体数值调整，指定后将忽略boundaryGap[0]
min.descriptionEN: The pecified minimum value, such as 0. Defaults to null. Further determined by specific values. Ignores boundaryGap[0] when specified.

max.descriptionCN: 指定的最大值，eg: 100，默认无，会自动根据具体数值调整，指定后将忽略boundaryGap[1]
max.descriptionEN: The pecified maximum value, such as 100. Defaults to null. Further determined by specific values. Ignores boundaryGap[1] when specified.

scale.descriptionCN: 脱离0值比例，放大聚焦到最终_min，_max区间
scale.descriptionEN: If false, the value axis must start with 0. If true, you can set the minimum and maximum value of value axis as the starting and ending value of your value axis.

splitNumber.descriptionCN: 分割段数，不指定时根据min、max算法调整
splitNumber.descriptionEN: Number of segments, defaults to auto split along with the min/max.

logLabelBase.descriptionCN: axis.type === 'log'时生效。指定时，axisLabel显示为指数形式，如指定为4时，axisLabel可显示为4²、4³。不指定时，显示为普通形式，如 1,000,000
logLabelBase.descriptionEN: This option works when axis.type === 'log'. If specified, axisLabel is drawn as exponent style. For example, when logLabelBase = 4, axisLabel is drawn like 4², 4³. If not specified, axisLabel is drawn like 1,000,000 as usual.

logPositive.descriptionCN: axis.type === 'log'时生效。指明是否使用反向log数轴（从而支持value为负值）。默认自适应，即如果value全为负值，则logPositive自动设为false，否则为true。
logPositive.descriptionEN: This option works when axis.type === 'log'. If set to false, negative value is supported. It is self-adapting by default, which means that if all of the data is negative, logPositive will be set to false, otherwise true.

axisLine.descriptionCN: 坐标轴线，默认显示，详见下方
axisLine.descriptionEN: Axis line. Default to show. See below.

axisTick.descriptionCN: 坐标轴小标记，默认不显示，详见下方
axisTick.descriptionEN: Axis tick. Defaults to hide. See below.

axisLabel.descriptionCN: 坐标轴文本标签，详见下方

splitLine.descriptionCN: 分隔线，默认显示，，详见下方
splitLine.descriptionEN: Split line. Defaults to show. See below.

splitArea.descriptionCN: 分隔区域，默认不显示，详见下方
splitArea.descriptionEN: Split area. Defaults to hide. See below.

data.descriptionCN:
类目型坐标轴文本标签数组，指定label内容。 数组项通常为文本，'\n'指定换行，如: 
['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', ..., 'Dec']
当需要对个别标签进行个性化定义时，数组项可用对象，接受textStyle设置个性化标签，如： 
[
    'Jav', 'Feb', 'Mar',
     {
        value:'Apr',            //文本内容，如指定间隔名称格式器formatter，则这个值将被作为模板变量值或参数传入
        textStyle:{             //详见textStyle
            color : 'red'
            ...
        }
     },
    'May', '...'
]
data.descriptionEN:
the array of category axis text label, specifies label content. The array items are usually tex. '\n' represents a line feed, for example: 
['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', ..., 'Dec']
When you need to customize individual labels, the array can use objects to accept textStyle to set custom labels, such as: 
[
    'Jav', 'Feb', 'Mar',
     {
        value:'Apr',        //Text content, if the split name formatter is specified, this value will be passed in as a template variable value ​​or parameter.
        textStyle:{                 //see textStyle
            color : 'red'
            ...
        }
     },
    'May', '...'
]

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示，默认为true，设为false后下面都没意义了
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show axisLine. Defaults to true, which is a prerequisite for the following properties.

onZero.descriptionCN: 定位到垂直方向的0值坐标上
onZero.descriptionEN: Locates to the coordinates whose vertical axis value is 0.

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示，默认为false，设为true后下面为默认样式
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show axisTick. Defaults to false. The following properties will be set by default values When it is true.
show.defaultExplanation:
false（数值轴和时间轴）
true（类目轴）

interval.descriptionCN:
小标记显示挑选间隔，默认为'auto'，可选为：
'auto'（随axisLabel，自动隐藏显示不下的） | 0（全部显示） |
{number}（用户指定选择间隔）
{function}函数回调，传递参数[index，data[index]]，返回true显示，返回false隐藏
interval.descriptionEN:
specifies the interval between axisTicks. Defaults to 'auto'. Valid values are:
'auto' (automatically hide those that cannot be displayed) | 0 (unhide all) |
{number}(specified by the user).
{function}callback, paramater is [index，data[index]], return true to show and false to hide

onGap.descriptionCN: 小标记是否显示为间隔，默认等于boundaryGap
onGap.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the axisTick will be positioned at regular intervals. Defaults to boundaryGap.

inside.descriptionCN: 小标记是否显示为在grid内部，默认在外部
inside.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the axisTick will be displayed inside the grid. Defaults to outside.

length.descriptionEN: controls the length of the line.

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示，默认为true，设为false后下面都没意义了
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show axisLabel. Defaults to true, which is a prerequisite for the following properties.

interval.descriptionCN:
标签显示挑选间隔，默认为'auto'，可选为：
'auto'（自动隐藏显示不下的） | 0（全部显示） |
{number}（用户指定选择间隔）
{function}函数回调，传递参数[index，data[index]]，返回true显示，返回false隐藏
interval.descriptionEN:
specifies the interval between axisLabels. Defaults to 'auto'. Valid values are:
'auto' (automatically hide those that cannot be displayed) | 0 (unhide all) |
{number}(specified by the user).
{function}callback, paramater is [index，data[index]], return true to show and false to hide

rotate.descriptionCN: 标签旋转角度，默认为0，不旋转，正值为逆时针，负值为顺时针，可选为：-90 ~ 90
rotate.descriptionEN: The angle of rotation, defaults to 0 (not rotate). Positive value for counterclockwise rotation, negative value for clockwise rotation. Valid values are: -90 ~ 90.

margin.descriptionCN: 坐标轴文本标签与坐标轴的间距，默认为8，单位px
margin.descriptionEN: The pixel distance between the axisLabel and the axis.Defaults to 8.

clickable.descriptionCN: 坐标轴文本标签是否可点击
clickable.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the axisLabel is clickable.

textStyle.descriptionCN: 文本样式，其中当坐标轴为数值型和时间型时，color接受方法回调，实现个性化的颜色定义，support #226 »
textStyle.descriptionEN: text style. If the axis is value or time axis, color accepts method callback to achieve custom color definition, support #226 »

show.descriptionCN: 是否显示，默认为true，设为false后下面都没意义了
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show splitLine. Defaults to true, which is a prerequisite for the following properties.

onGap.descriptionCN: 分隔线是否显示为间隔，默认等于boundaryGap
onGap.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the splitLine will be positioned at regular intervals. Equal to boundaryGap by default.

show.descriptionCN: 通用
show.descriptionEN: universal

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

center.descriptionCN: 圆心坐标，支持绝对值（px）和百分比，百分比计算min(width, height) * 50%
center.descriptionEN: coordinate of the center, in pixels or percent. The formula for calculating percent: min(width, height) * 50%.

radius.descriptionCN: 半径，支持绝对值（px）和百分比，百分比计算min(width, height) / 2 * 75%,
radius.descriptionEN: radius, in pixels or in percent. The formula for calculating percent: min(width, height) / 2 * 75%.

startAngle.descriptionCN: 开始角度, 有效输入范围：[-180,180]
startAngle.descriptionEN: The start angle. Valid range is: [-180,180]

splitNumber.descriptionEN: the number of segments, defaults to 5

boundaryGap.descriptionCN: 数值轴两端空白策略，数组内数值代表百分比，[原始数据最小值与最终最小值之间的差额，原始数据最大值与最终最大值之间的差额]
boundaryGap.descriptionEN: blank border on each side of the value axis. the value within the array represents percentage, [the difference between the original minimum value and the final minimum value, the difference between the original maximum value and the final maximum value].

scale.descriptionCN: 脱离0值比例，放大聚焦到最终_min，_max区间
scale.descriptionEN: If false, the value axis must start with 0. If true, you can set the minimum and maximum value of value axis as the starting and ending value of your value axis.

axisLine.descriptionCN: 坐标轴线，默认显示，属性show控制显示与否，属性lineStyle（详见lineStyle）控制线条样式
axisLine.descriptionEN: axis line. Defaults to show. The property "show" specifies whether to show axisLine or not. The property "lineStyle" (see lineStyle) controls line style for axisLine.

splitLine.descriptionCN: 分隔线，默认显示，属性show控制显示与否，属性lineStyle控制线条样式
splitLine.descriptionEN: split line. Defaults to show. The property "show" specifies whether to show splitLine or not. The property "lineStyle" controls line style for splitLine.

splitArea.descriptionCN: 分隔区域，默认不显示，属性show控制显示与否，属性areaStyle控制区域样式
splitArea.descriptionEN: split area. Defaults to hide. The property "show" specifies whether to show splitArea or not. The property "areaStyle" controls area style for splitArea.

type.descriptionCN: 极坐标的形状，'polygon'|'circle' 多边形|圆形
type.descriptionEN: The shape of polar coordinates. Valid values are: 'polygon'|'circle'.

indicator.descriptionEN: radar indicator list, also label content, see the example below.

oneOf.descriptionCN:
图表类型，必要参数！如为空或不支持类型，则该系列数据不被显示。可选为：
'line'（折线图） | 'bar'（柱状图） | 'scatter'（散点图） | 'k'（K线图）
'pie'（饼图） | 'radar'（雷达图） | 'chord'（和弦图） | 'force'（力导向布局图） | 'map'（地图）
oneOf.descriptionEN:
chart type. Required parameter. If null or unsupported type, the data of this series will not be shown. Valid values are:
'line' | 'bar' | 'scatter' | 'candlestick'
'pie' | 'radar' | 'chord' | 'force' | 'map'

name.descriptionCN: 系列名称，如启用legend，该值将被legend.data索引相关
name.descriptionEN: name of series. if the legend is enabled, the value will be indexed to legend.data.

tooltip.descriptionCN: 提示框样式，仅对本系列有效，如不设则用option.tooltip,鼠标悬浮交互时的信息提示
tooltip.descriptionEN: style of the tooltip. Applicable to this series only. If unspecified, use option.tooltip (See tooltip), a small "hover box" with detailed information about the item being hovered over.

clickable.descriptionCN: 数据图形是否可点击，默认开启，如果没有click事件响应可以关闭
clickable.descriptionEN: Specifies data graphic clickable or not, default to true, recommend to false when you do not have a click event handler.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 图形样式
oneOf.descriptionEN: item style.

oneOf.descriptionCN:
当某类目对应数据不存在时（ps：'不存在' 不代表值为 0），可用'-'表示，无数据在折线图中表现为折线在该点断开，在柱状图中表现为该点无柱形，如： 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
When the data corresponding to a category does not exist (ps: 'no data' is not equal to 0), you can use '-' to indicate 'no data'. In line, 'no data' is showed by a breakpoint; in column, 'no data' is showed by a missing column, such as: 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]

oneOf.descriptionCN:
系列中的数据内容数组，折线图以及柱状图时数组长度等于所使用类目轴文本标签数组axis.data的长度，并且他们间是一一对应的。数组项通常为数值，如: 
[12, 34, 56, ..., 10, 23]
当某类目对应数据不存在时（ps：'不存在' 不代表值为 0），可用'-'表示，无数据在折线图中表现为折线在该点断开，在柱状图中表现为该点无柱形，如： 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
当需要对个别内容进行个性化定义时，数组项可用对象，如： 
[
    12, 34,
    {
        value : 56,
        tooltip:{},             //自定义特殊tooltip，仅对该item有效，详见tooltip
        itemStyle:{}            //自定义特殊itemStyle，仅对该item有效，详见itemStyle
    },
    ..., 10, 23
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
Data array in the series. In line and column, length of the array is equal to the length of category axis text label array axis.data, and there is one-to-one correspondence between them. The array item is usually value, such as: 
[12, 34, 56, ..., 10, 23]
When the data corresponding to a category does not exist (ps: 'no data' is not equal to 0), you can use '-' to indicate 'no data'. In line, 'no data' is showed by a breakpoint; in column, 'no data' is showed by a missing column, such as: 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
When you need to customize individual contents, array items can use objects, such as: 
[
    12, 34,
    {
        value : 56,
        tooltip:{},     //custom tooltip，applicable to the item only, see tooltip
        itemStyle:{}    //custom itemStyle=，applicable to the item only, see itemStyle
    },
    ..., 10, 23
]

oneOf.descriptionCN:
当某类目对应数据不存在时（ps：'不存在' 不代表值为 0），可用'-'表示，无数据在折线图中表现为折线在该点断开，在柱状图中表现为该点无柱形，如： 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
当图表类型为scatter（散点图或气泡图）时，其数值设置比较特殊，他的横纵坐标轴都可能为数值型，并且气泡图时需要指定气泡大小，所以scatter型图表设置为： 
[
    {
        value : [10, 25, 5]     //[xValue, yValue, rValue]，数组内依次为横值，纵值，大小(可选)
    },
    [12, 15, 1]
    ...
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
When the data corresponding to a category does not exist (ps: 'no data' is not equal to 0), you can use '-' to indicate 'no data'. In line, 'no data' is showed by a breakpoint; in column, 'no data' is showed by a missing column, such as: 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
In scatter & bubble, value configuration is quite special. Both its x-axis and y-axis can be value axis, and you need to specify bubble size in the bubble chart. Hence the configuration for scatter: 
[
    {
        value : [10, 25, 5]     //[xValue, yValue, rValue] (x-axis value, y-axis value, size(optional))
    },
    [12, 15, 1]
    ...
]

oneOf.descriptionCN:
当某类目对应数据不存在时（ps：'不存在' 不代表值为 0），可用'-'表示，无数据在折线图中表现为折线在该点断开，在柱状图中表现为该点无柱形，如： 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
当图表类型为K线图时，其数值设置比较特殊，他的数值内容为长度为4的数组，分别代表[开盘价，收盘价，最低值，最高值] 
[
    {
        value : [2190.1, 2148.35, 2126.22, 2190.1] // // 开盘，收盘，最低，最高
    },
    [2242.26, 2210.9, 2205.07, 2250.63],
    ...
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
When the data corresponding to a category does not exist (ps: 'no data' is not equal to 0), you can use '-' to indicate 'no data'. In line, 'no data' is showed by a breakpoint; in column, 'no data' is showed by a missing column, such as: 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
In candlestick, value configuration is quite special. Its value content is an array with the length of 4, which respectively represents [opening price, closing price, the minimum value, the maximum value] 
[
    {
        value : [2190.1, 2148.35, 2126.22, 2190.1] // opening price, closing price, the minimum value, the maximum value
    },
    [2242.26, 2210.9, 2205.07, 2250.63],
    ...
]

oneOf.descriptionCN:
当某类目对应数据不存在时（ps：'不存在' 不代表值为 0），可用'-'表示，无数据在折线图中表现为折线在该点断开，在柱状图中表现为该点无柱形，如： 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
当图表类型为饼图时，需要说明每部分数据的名称name，可设置选中状态，所以设置为： 
[
    {
        value : 12，
        name : 'apple'          //每部分数据的名称
    },
    ...
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
When the data corresponding to a category does not exist (ps: 'no data' is not equal to 0), you can use '-' to indicate 'no data'. In line, 'no data' is showed by a breakpoint; in column, 'no data' is showed by a missing column, such as: 
[12, '-', 56, ..., 10, 23]
In pie, you need to specify the name for each part of data. Selected mode can be set. Hence the configuration: 
[
    {
        value : 12，
        name : 'apple'          //the name for each part of data
    },
    ...
]

items.descriptionCN: 数据列表，每一个数组项为Object {}
items.descriptionEN: Array, each item is an Object

items.descriptionCN: 同一事件的的演化过程，每一个数组项为Object {}
items.descriptionEN: Evolution of a single event, every item in the array is an object {}

time.descriptionCN: 事件发生的时间，Javascript中的Date类型
time.descriptionEN: When the event is taking place, should be Data type of Javascript.

value.descriptionCN: 事件的热度值，如该事件涉及到的新闻报道数量
value.descriptionEN: Popularity of the event, such as the number of news reports.

link.descriptionCN: 该事件报道的新闻链接

items.descriptionCN: 数据列表，每一个数组项为Object {}
items.descriptionEN: Array, each item is an Object

children.descriptionCN: 子节点，每项的属性和父节点相同

items.descriptionCN: 子节点，每项的属性和父节点相同
items.descriptionEN: children，Its structure is the same as its parent.
The array has only one item, which type is Object {}.

symbolSize.descriptionCN: 所有该类目的节点的大小

children.descriptionCN: 子节点，每项的属性和父节点相同

items.descriptionCN: 子节点，每项的属性和父节点相同
items.descriptionEN: children，Its structure is the same as its parent.

items.descriptionCN: 数据列表，长度为3，前两项分别表示两个集合，第三项表示交集。每一个数组项为Object {}
items.descriptionEN: data list, contains 3 items, the first and second represent two collections, the third one is the intersection. Every item in the array is an object {}

oneOf.descriptionCN: 二维数组。每项例如[100, 80, 0.67]，前两项为坐标，第三项为0-1区间的值表示热力。
oneOf.descriptionEN: 2-dimension array, like [100, 80, 0.67]. The first two items indicate location, and the third item indicates heat, which is between 0 and 1.

stack.descriptionCN: 组合名称，双数值轴时无效，多组数据的堆积图时使用，eg：stack:'group1'，则series数组中stack值等于'group1'的数据做堆积计算
stack.descriptionEN: name of the stack, USELESS in irregular line|bar. It is used in stacked charts with multiple groups of data. For example, stack:'group1' means to stack the values of the data whose stack value is 'group1' in the series array.

oneOf.descriptionCN: xAxis坐标轴数组的索引，指定该系列数据所用的横坐标轴
oneOf.descriptionEN: xAxis the index of the axis array. Specifies the horizontal axis that the data series uses.

oneOf.descriptionCN: xAxis坐标轴数组的索引，指定该系列数据所用的横坐标轴
oneOf.descriptionEN: xAxis the index of the axis array. Specifies the horizontal axis that the data series uses.

yAxisIndex.descriptionCN: yAxis坐标轴数组的索引，指定该系列数据所用的纵坐标轴
yAxisIndex.descriptionEN: yAxis the index of the axis array. Specifies the vertical axis that the data series uses.

barGap.descriptionCN: 柱间距离，默认为柱形宽度的30%，可设固定值
barGap.descriptionEN: the distance between each bar. Defaults to  barWidth * 30%. Can also set to be a fixed value.

barCategoryGap.descriptionCN: 类目间柱形距离，默认为类目间距的20%，可设固定值
barCategoryGap.descriptionEN: the distance between each bar cetegory. Defaults to  barCategoryWidth * 20%. Can also set to be a fixed value.

barMinHeight.descriptionCN: 柱条最小高度，可用于防止某item的值过小而影响交互
barMinHeight.descriptionEN: The minimum height for the bar. Used to prevent tiny item values from affecting interaction.

barWidth.descriptionCN: 柱条（K线蜡烛）宽度，不设时自适应
barWidth.descriptionEN: the width of the bar/ candlestick. Adaptive when not specified.

barMaxWidth.descriptionCN: 柱条（K线蜡烛）最大宽度，不设时自适应
barMaxWidth.descriptionEN: the maximum width of the bar ( candlestick ). Adaptive when not specified.

oneOf.descriptionCN:
标志图形类型，默认自动选择（8种类型循环使用，不显示标志图形可设为'none'），默认循环选择类型有：
'circle' | 'rectangle' | 'triangle' | 'diamond' |
'emptyCircle' | 'emptyRectangle' | 'emptyTriangle' | 'emptyDiamond'
另外，还支持五种更特别的标志图形'heart'（心形）、'droplet'（水滴）、'pin'（标注）、'arrow'（箭头）和'star'（五角星），这并不出现在常规的8类图形中，但无论是在系列级还是数据级上你都可以指定使用，同时，'star' + n（n>=3)可变化出N角星，如指定为'star6'则可以显示6角星
自1.3.5起支持symbol为自定义图片，格式为'image://' + '图片路径'， 如'image://../asset/ico/favicon.png'
详见例子 this 》
oneOf.descriptionEN:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. The default symbol is automatically selected from (When all symbols are used, new symbols are pulled from the start again. Set it to'none' if you don't want to show the symbol):
'circle' | 'rectangle' | 'triangle' | 'diamond' |
'emptyCircle' | 'emptyRectangle' | 'emptyTriangle' | 'emptyDiamond'
Other possible values are 'heart', 'droplet', 'pin', 'arrow' and 'star'. Although They are not included in the regular eight symbols above, you can use them at both series and data level. In addition, you can use 'star' + n (n>=3) to get N-pointed star, like 'star6' for six-pointed star.
Since 1.3.5, ECharts added support for setting custom image as symbol. The URL to an image can be given on this form:'image://' + 'URL', such as 'image://../asset/ico/favicon.png'.
See example 》

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标志图形大小，可计算特性启用情况建议增大以提高交互体验。可以是单个值，如果在 symbol 为图片的时候想要分别设置宽高防止图片被拉伸，可以使用数组，其中数组第一个值是高，第二个值是宽。 实现气泡图时symbolSize需为Function，气泡大小取决于该方法返回值，传入参数为当前数据项（value数组）。
oneOf.descriptionEN: size of the symbol. It is usually a number. But if you use an image as symbol. To prevent stretching of image caused by same width and height, you can use an array as symbolSize which first element is width and the second is height. When "calculable" is enabled, it's recommended to increase symbolSize for better interactive experience. When implementing a bubble chart, symbolSize should be a Function, and the bubble size depends on the return value of the method, the parameter passed in is the current data item (value array).

oneOf.descriptionEN: size of the node.

oneOf.descriptionEN: Size of symbol, Only available if ribbonType is false

oneOf.descriptionEN: size of nodes

showAllSymbol.descriptionCN: 标志图形默认只有主轴显示（随主轴标签间隔隐藏策略），如需全部显示可把showAllSymbol设为true
showAllSymbol.descriptionEN: By default, a symbol will show only when its corresponding axis label does. set it to true if you need to show all the symbols.

smooth.descriptionCN: 平滑曲线显示，smooth为true时lineStyle不支持虚线
smooth.descriptionEN: smoothed line, while smooth is true, lineStyle.type can not be dashed.

dataFilter.descriptionCN:
ECharts 会在折线图的数据数量大于实际显示的像素宽度（高度）的时候会启用优化，对显示在一个像素宽度内的数据做筛选，该选项是指明数据筛选的策略。

可选 'nearest', 'min', 'max', 'average'。或者是使用自定义的筛选函数
dataFilter.descriptionEN:
ECharts will optimize for the situation when data number is much larger than viewport width. It will filter the data showed in one pixel width. And this option is for data filtering strategy.
Options: 'nearest', 'min', 'max', 'average'.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 启动大规模散点图
oneOf.descriptionEN: enables large scale scatter.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 在 500+ 顶点的图上建议设置 large 为 true, 会使用 Barnes-Hut simulation, 同时开启 useWorker 并且把 steps 值调大
oneOf.descriptionEN: it is suggested that you set it to true on a chart with over 500 vertices, use Barnes-Hut simulation; meanwhile, open useWorker and increase the value of steps.

largeThreshold.descriptionCN: 大规模散点图自动切换阀值，large为true下有效
largeThreshold.descriptionEN: the threshold of large scale scatter anto-switch. Valid when set to true.

oneOf.descriptionEN: coordinate of the center, in pixels or percent. The formula for calculating percent: min(width, height) * 50%.

minAngle.descriptionEN: The minimum angle for the pie. Used to prevent tiny item values from affecting interaction.

mapType.descriptionCN:
地图类型，支持world，china及全国34个省市自治区。省市自治区的mapType直接使用简体中文：
新疆， 西藏， 内蒙古， 青海， 四川， 黑龙江， 甘肃， 云南， 广西， 湖南， 陕西，
广东，吉林， 河北， 湖北， 贵州， 山东， 江西， 河南， 辽宁， 山西， 安徽， 福建，
浙江， 江苏，重庆， 宁夏， 海南， 台湾， 北京， 天津， 上海， 香港， 澳门'
支持子区域模式，通过主地图类型扩展出所包含的子区域地图，格式为'主地图类型|子区域名称'，如
'world|Brazil'，'china|广东'，详见例子 this 》
mapType.descriptionEN:
map type, including World Map, China Map, Map of China Provinces & Cities. For the mapType of China Provinces & Cities, just use simplified Chinese.
新疆, 西藏, 内蒙古, 青海, 四川, 黑龙江, 甘肃, 云南, 广西, 湖南, 陕西,
广东, 吉林, 河北, 湖北, 贵州, 山东, 江西, 河南, 辽宁, 山西, 安徽, 福建,
浙江, 江苏, 重庆, 宁夏, 海南, 台湾, 北京, 天津, 上海, 香港, 澳门'
Supports sub-region mode, which develops sub-region maps from the main map types. The format is 'main map type | sub-region name', like
'world|Brazil', 'china|广东'. See example 》

hoverable.descriptionCN: 非数值显示（如仅用于显示标注标线时），可以通过hoverable:false关闭区域悬浮高亮
hoverable.descriptionEN: Non-numerical display (eg: only used to display markPoints and markLines). Set it to false to turn off regional hover highlight.

dataRangeHoverLink.descriptionCN: 是否启用值域漫游组件（dataRange）hover时的联动响应（详情披露）
dataRangeHoverLink.descriptionEN: enables dataRange hover link to the chart

mapLocation.descriptionCN: 地图位置设置，默认只适应上下左右居中可配x，y，width，height，任意参数为空都将根据其他参数自适应
mapLocation.descriptionEN: Map location. x, y, width, height are configurable. Valid values for x and y are 'top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right', 'center', or absolute pixel value. Width and height can be set in pixel values. If any parameter is null, it will be adaptive in accordance with other parameters.

mapValueCalculation.descriptionCN: 地图数值计算方式，默认为加和，可选为：'sum'（总数） | 'average'（均值）
mapValueCalculation.descriptionEN: Calculation of map value. Defaults to sum. Valid values are: 'sum' | 'average'

mapValuePrecision.descriptionCN: 地图数值计算结果小数精度，mapValueCalculation为average时有效，默认为取整，需要小数精度时设置大于0的整数
mapValuePrecision.descriptionEN: Decimal precision of map value calculation. Valid when mapValueCalculation is set to average. Defaults to rounding.If decimal precision is needed, set an integer greater than 0.

showLegendSymbol.descriptionCN: 显示图例颜色标识（系列标识的小圆点），存在legend时生效
showLegendSymbol.descriptionEN: Color of show legend symbol (small dots symbolizing different series). Valid when there is a legend.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 是否开启滚轮缩放和拖拽漫游，默认为false（关闭），其他有效输入为true（开启），'scale'（仅开启滚轮缩放），'move'（仅开启拖拽漫游）
oneOf.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the wheel zoom and drag roam will be enabled. Default to false (boolean), can be true (boolean) and 'scale' (string) for just enable the zoom(in/out), 'move' (string) for just enable the move.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 是否开启滚轮缩放和拖拽漫游，默认为false（关闭），其他有效输入为true（开启），'scale'（仅开启滚轮缩放），'move'（仅开启拖拽漫游）
oneOf.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the wheel zoom and drag roam will be enabled. Default to false (boolean), can be true (boolean) and 'scale' (string) for just enable the zoom(in/out), 'move' (string) for just enable the move.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 是否开启滚轮缩放和拖拽漫游，默认为false（关闭），其他有效输入为true（开启），'scale'（仅开启滚轮缩放），'move'（仅开启拖拽漫游）
oneOf.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the wheel zoom and drag roam will be enabled. Default to false (boolean), can be true (boolean) and 'scale' (string) for just enable the zoom(in/out), 'move' (string) for just enable the move.

scaleLimit.descriptionCN: 滚轮缩放的极限控制，可指定{max:number, min:number}，其中max为放大系数，有效值应大于1，min为缩小系数，有效值应小于1
scaleLimit.descriptionEN: Controls the limit of wheel zoom. You can specify {max:number, min:number}, max is magnification coefficient, whose valid value should be greater than 1; min is reduction coefficient, whose valid value should be less than 1.

nameMap.descriptionCN: 自定义地区的名称映射，如{'China' : '中国'}
nameMap.descriptionEN: name mapping of the custom region, like {'China' : '中国'}.

textFixed.descriptionCN: 地区的名称文本位置修正，数值单位为px，正值为左下偏移，负值为右上偏移，如{'China' : [10, -10]}
textFixed.descriptionEN: fixed location of the name text of a region in px. When the value is positive, move to the lower left; When the value is negative, move to the upper right. Such as {'China' : [10, -10]}.

geoCoord.descriptionCN: 通过绝对经纬度指定地区的名称文本位置，如{'Islands':[113.95, 22.26]}，香港离岛区名称显示定位到东经113.95，北纬22.26上
geoCoord.descriptionEN: Specifies the location of the name text of a region by absolute latitude and longitude. For example, {'Islands':[113.95, 22.26]}: the name of Hong Kong's Islands District is located at 22.26°N and 113.95°E.
