linkSymbol.descriptionCN: 力导向图的边两端图形样式，可指定为'arrow',
linkSymbol.descriptionEN: symbol of force's link. Can be specified as 'arrow'.

linkSymbolSize.descriptionCN: 力导向图的边两端图形大小
linkSymbolSize.descriptionEN: the size of force's link symbol.

scaling.descriptionCN: 布局缩放系数，并不完全精确, 效果跟布局大小类似
scaling.descriptionEN: layout scaling factor, not entirely accurate, achieves similar effect with the layout size.

gravity.descriptionCN: 向心力系数，系数越大则节点越往中心靠拢
gravity.descriptionEN: centripetal force coefficient. The greater the coefficient, the closer the node is to the center.

draggable.descriptionEN: specifies whether the node is draggable.

useWorker.descriptionCN: 是否在浏览器支持 web worker 的时候把布局计算放入 web worker 中
useWorker.descriptionEN: specifies whether to put layout calculation into web worker when the browser supports web worker.

steps.descriptionCN: 每一帧布局计算的迭代次数，因为每一帧绘制的时间经常会比布局时间长很多，所以在使用 web worker 的时候可以把 steps 调大来平衡两者的时间从而达到效率最优化
steps.descriptionEN: the number of iterations of each frame layout calculation. Since it takes much more time to render each frame than layout, so when using web worker you can increase the value of steps to balance the two, so as to achieve optimum efficiency.

ribbonType.descriptionCN: ribbonType的和弦图节点使用扇形绘制，边使用有大小端的ribbon绘制，可以表示出边的权重，图的节点边之间必须是双向边，非ribbonType的和弦图节点使用symbol绘制，边使用贝塞尔曲线，不能表示边的权重，但是可以使用单向边
ribbonType.descriptionEN: Chord with ribbon type is drawed with sector and ribbon shapes. Each ribbon can represent the weight of edge with the size of two ends. Chord without ribbon type is drawed with symbols and bezier curves. Which can't represent edge weight.

showScale.descriptionCN: 是否显示刻度, ribbonType为true时有效
showScale.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the scale will be showed. Only available if ribbonType is true

showScaleText.descriptionCN: 是否显示刻度文字, ribbonType为true时有效
showScaleText.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the scale text will be showed. Only available if ribbonType is true

padding.descriptionCN: 每个sector之间的间距(用角度表示)
padding.descriptionEN: the distance between each sector (in degrees).

oneOf.descriptionCN: 数据排序， 可以取none, ascending, descending

oneOf.descriptionCN: 数据排序， 可以取ascending, descending

sortSub.descriptionCN: 数据排序（弦）， 可以取none, ascending, descending
sortSub.descriptionEN: Data sorting (chord). Can be one of none, ascending, descending.

endAngle.descriptionCN: 结束角度,有效输入范围：[-360,360]，保证startAngle - endAngle为正值
endAngle.descriptionEN: end angle. Valid range is: [-360,360], ensure that startAngle - endAngle is positive.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 指定的最小值
oneOf.descriptionEN: The specified minimum value.

color.descriptionEN: The property "color" controls the color of the pointer.

show.descriptionEN: The property "show" specifies whether to show title or not.

offsetCenter.descriptionEN: The property "offsetCenter" is used to locate title. Offset to the center coordinates if the array is x-axis. If in percent, it is relative to the outer radius of the gauge.

show.descriptionEN: The property "show" specifies whether to show detail or not.

offsetCenter.descriptionCN: 属性offsetCenter用于标题定位，数组为横纵相对仪表盘圆心坐标偏移，支持百分比（相对外半径）
offsetCenter.descriptionEN: The property "offsetCenter" is used to locate title. Offset to the center coordinates if the array is x-axis. If in percent, it is relative to the outer radius of the gauge.

x.descriptionCN: 左上角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x.descriptionEN: Abscissa on the upper left corner of the grid. In px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y.descriptionCN: 左上角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y.descriptionEN: Ordinate on the upper left corner of the grid. In px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

x2.descriptionCN: 右下角横坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域横向中心)
x2.descriptionEN: Abscissa on the lower right corner of the grid. In px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (horizontal center of the display area).

y2.descriptionCN: 右下角纵坐标，数值单位px，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域纵向中心)
y2.descriptionEN: Ordinate on the lower right corner of the grid. In px, or in percent (string) such as '50%' (vertical center of the display area).

width.descriptionCN: 总宽度，默认为绘图区总宽度 - x - x2，数值单位px，指定width后将忽略x2，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的宽度)
width.descriptionEN: The total width, defaults to the drawing area's total width - x - x2, in px, ignore x2 after specifying height. Can also be set in percent (string), such as '50%' (half the width of the display area).

height.descriptionCN: 总高度，默认为绘图区总高度 - y - y2，数值单位px，指定height后将忽略y2，支持百分比（字符串），如'50%'(显示区域一半的高度)
height.descriptionEN: The total height, defaults to the drawing area's total height - y - y2, in px, ignore y2 after specifying height. Can also be set in percent (string), such as '50%' (half the height of the display area).

funnelAlign.descriptionCN: 水平方向对齐布局类型，默认居中对齐，可用选项还有：'left' | 'right' | 'center'
funnelAlign.descriptionEN: Horizontal layout style, default to 'center', other option can be: 'left' | 'right' | 'center'

minSize.descriptionCN: 最小值min映射到总宽度的比例，如果需要最小值的图形并不是尖端三角，可设置minSize实现
minSize.descriptionEN: The proportion of the minimum value 'min' to the total width. If the symbol of required min is not sharp triangle, you can set minSize to achieve it.

maxSize.descriptionCN: 最大值max映射到总宽度的比例
maxSize.descriptionEN: The proportion of the maximum value 'max' to the total width.

weight.descriptionEN: Specifies the weight of this event's series.

root.descriptionCN: 当前显示的根节点的名字

direction.descriptionEN: to inverse the direction of the tree, can be: 'inverse'

textRotation.descriptionCN: 文字旋转角度可选列表，默认会随机从水平（0）和垂直（90）两个方向中选择，可以设置多个可选角度，例如 [0, -45, 45, 90]
textRotation.descriptionEN: List of optional text rotation. In default it has two options: horizontal(0) and vertical(90).

autoSize.descriptionCN: 字体大小自动计算配置，默认开启自动计算，程序会根据每个数据的 value 大小以及画布的大小控制字体大小以达到最佳的显示效果。minSize 可以强制最小字体。 关闭的时候字体大小取 itemStyle.normal.textStyle.fontSize，建议开启。
autoSize.descriptionEN: If enable text size auto calculation. It is recommand to enable to have a better result.

blurSize.descriptionCN: 一个热力图数据点的模糊范围，单位是像素
blurSize.descriptionEN: Blur size of a data point.

gradientColors.descriptionCN: 可以是一个包含 offset 和 color 的 Object 的数组，如 [{ offset: 0.2, color: 'blue' }, { offset 0.8, color: 'cyan' }]；也可以是一个颜色字符串的数组如 ['blue', 'cyan', 'lime', 'yellow', 'red']，颜色将均匀分布。
gradientColors.descriptionEN: It could be an array of offset and color like [{ offset: 0.2, color: 'blue' }, { offset 0.8, color: 'cyan' }] or an array of color strings like ['blue', 'cyan', 'lime', 'yellow', 'red'], with which the color will transform evenly.

minAlpha.descriptionCN: 当均一化后的数据点的值小于这个值时，将被设为该值。该值保证了数据值很小的数据也能在地图上展示。
minAlpha.descriptionEN: If the unified value is less than minAlpha, it will be set to minAlpha to ensure small data value can also be visible on the chart.

valueScale.descriptionCN: 所有数据点的值将乘以这个值再进行绘制。
valueScale.descriptionEN: All data values will multiply this value.

opacity.descriptionCN: 整个热力图的不透明度。

heatmap.descriptionCN: 叠加在地图上的热力图，数据位置为经纬度。参见heatmap on map
heatmap.descriptionEN: Heatmap overlaid on map, measured by longitude and latitude. see heatmap on map

z.descriptionCN: 二级层叠控制，同一个canvas（相同zlevel）上z越高约靠顶层。
z.descriptionEN: The second grade cascading control, In the same canvas (zlevel), the higher z the closer to the top.

zlevel.descriptionCN: 一级层叠控制。每一个不同的zlevel将产生一个独立的canvas，相同zlevel的组件或图标将在同一个canvas上渲染。zlevel越高越靠顶层，canvas对象增多会消耗更多的内存和性能，并不建议设置过多的zlevel，大部分情况可以通过二级层叠控制z实现层叠控制。
zlevel.descriptionEN: The first grade cascading control. Every zlevel will be allocated to a independent canvas, charts and components with the same zlevel will be rendered in the same canvas. The higher zlevel the closer to the top. More canvas dom will need more memory and performance, so never set too many zlevel. Most of the time, the second grade cascading control 'z' is recommended.

clickable.descriptionCN: 数据图形是否可点击，默认开启，如果没有click事件响应可以关闭
clickable.descriptionEN: Specifies data graphic clickable or not, default to true, recommend to false when you do not have a click event handler.

symbol.descriptionEN: the symbol of markPoint, same as series' symbol.

symbolSize.descriptionEN: the size of markPoint symbol, same as series' symbolSize.

symbolRotate.descriptionCN: 标注图形旋转角度，同series中的symbolRotate
symbolRotate.descriptionEN: the angle by which markPoint symbol rotates, same as series' symbolRotate.

large.descriptionCN: 是否启动大规模标注模式
large.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the large scale markPoint mode will be enabled.

effect.descriptionCN:
标注图形炫光特效:
show 是否开启，默认关闭
type 特效类型，默认为'scale'（放大），可选还有'bounce'（跳动）
loop 循环动画，默认开启,
period 运动周期，无单位，值越大越慢，默认为15
scaleSize 放大倍数，以markPoint symbolSize为基准，type为scale时有效
bounceDistance 跳动距离，单位为px，type为bounce时有效
color 炫光颜色，默认跟随markPoint itemStyle定义颜色,
shadowColor 光影颜色，默认跟随color
shadowBlur 光影模糊度，默认为0
百度迁徙（模拟） »
effect.descriptionEN:
glow effect for markPoint symbol:
show: specifies whether to show glow effect or not. Defaults to false.
type effect type, default to 'scale', can be 'bounce'.
loop: specifies whether to play the animation in a loop. Defaults to true.
period: animation period. No units. The larger the value, the slower. Defaults to 15.
scaleSize: magnification. Based on markPoint symbolSize, available when type is scale.
bounceDistance bouncing distance, in px, available when type is bounce.
color: color of the glow. The default value is pulled from the markPoint itemStyle array.
shadowColor: color of the shadow. The default value is pulled from the color array.
shadowBlur: blur degree of shadow. Defaults to 0.
Baidu Migration (Simulation) »

show.descriptionCN: 是否开启炫光特效，默认关闭
show.descriptionEN: specifies whether to show glow effect or not. Defaults to false.

type.descriptionCN: 特效类型，默认为'scale'（放大），可选还有'bounce'（跳动）
type.descriptionEN: effect type, default to 'scale', can be 'bounce'

loop.descriptionEN: specifies whether to play the animation in a loop. Defaults to true.

period.descriptionCN: 运动周期，无单位，值越大越慢，默认为15
period.descriptionEN: animation period. No units. The larger the value, the slower. Defaults to 15.

scaleSize.descriptionCN: 放大倍数，以markPoint symbolSize为基准，type为scale时有效。
scaleSize.descriptionEN: magnification. Based on markPoint symbolSize, available when type is scale.

bounceDistance.descriptionCN: 跳动距离，单位为px，type为bounce时有效
bounceDistance.descriptionEN: bouncing distance, in px, available when type is bounce.

color.descriptionCN: 炫光颜色，默认跟随markPoint itemStyle定义颜色
color.descriptionEN: color of the glow. The default value is pulled from the markPoint itemStyle array.

shadowColor.descriptionEN: color of the shadow. The default value is pulled from the color array.

shadowBlur.descriptionEN: blur degree of shadow. Defaults to 0.

itemStyle.descriptionCN: 标注图形样式属性，同series中的itemStyle
itemStyle.descriptionEN: style for markPoint symbol, same as series' itemStyle.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标注图形数据
oneOf.descriptionEN: data of markPoint

oneOf.descriptionCN:
标注的数据内容数组，最直接的数据项可直接指定标注位置（x，y）以及相关名称（name）和值（value），在饼图、雷达图、力导、和弦图中基本如下: 
data : [
    {name: '标注1', value: 100, x: 50, y: 20},
    {name: '标注2', value: 200, x: 150, y: 120},
    ...
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
markPoint data array. The most direct data items can directly specify markPoint position (x, y) and the relevant name and value. It's basically like this in pie, radar, force, and chord: 
data : [
    {name: 'markPoint1', value: 100, x: 50, y: 20},
    {name: 'markPoint2', value: 200, x: 150, y: 120},
    ...
]

oneOf.descriptionCN:
在存在直角坐标系的图表如折线、柱形、K线、散点图中，除了通过直接指定位置外，如果希望标注基于直角系的定位，可以通过xAxis，yAxis实现，这两个值都会根据坐标轴类型以及传入参数的不同自动换算如下： 
data : [
    {name: '标注1', value: 100, xAxis: 1, yAxis: 20},      // 当xAxis为类目轴时，数值1会被理解为类目轴的index
    {name: '标注2', value: 100, xAxis: '周三', yAxis: 20}, // 当xAxis为类目轴时，字符串'周三'会被理解为与类目轴的文本进行匹配
    {name: '标注3', value: 200, xAxis: 10, yAxis: 20},     // 当xAxis或yAxis为数值轴时，不管传入是什么，都被理解为数值后做空间位置换算
    ...
]
更为实用的，在折线、柱形、散点图中，可以直接使用如下几个开箱即用的特殊点标注 
data : [
    {type : 'max', name: '自定义名字'},    // 最大值
    {type : 'min', name: '自定义名字'}     // 最小值
]
oneOf.descriptionEN:
In Cartesian charts like line, bar, candlestick, and scatter, directly specifying the location is not the only choice you've got. If you want to locate markPoint by Cartesian system, you can make it via xAxis, yAxis. These two values ​​will, in accordance with the specific axis type and parameters passed in, make automatic convertions as follows: 
data : [
    {name: 'markPoint1', value: 100, xAxis: 1, yAxis: 20},      // When xAxis is the category axis, value 1 will be understood as the index of the category axis.
    {name: 'markPoint2', value: 100, xAxis: 'Wednesday', yAxis: 20}, // When xAxis is the category axis, String 'Wednesday' will be understood as matching the category axis text.
    {name: 'markPoint3', value: 200, xAxis: 10, yAxis: 20},     // When xAxis/yAxis is the value axis, whatever passed in will be understood as a value and be conversed to location.
    ...
]
And the most practical bit is, in line, bar and scatter, you can directly use the following off-the-shelf special points as markPoints: 
data : [
    {type : 'max', name: 'custom name'},    // the maximum value
    {type : 'min', name: 'custom name'}     // the minimum value
]

clickable.descriptionCN: 数据图形是否可点击，默认开启，如果没有click事件响应可以关闭
clickable.descriptionEN: Specifies data graphic clickable or not, default to true, recommend to false when you do not have a click event handler.

symbol.descriptionCN: 标线起始和结束的symbol介绍类型，如果都一样，可以直接传string，同series中的symbol
symbol.descriptionEN: symbols of the start and end of markLine. If the two are the same, string can be directly passed in. Same as series' symbol.

symbolSize.descriptionCN: 标线起始和结束的symbol大小，半宽（半径）参数，如果都一样，可以直接传number或function，同series中的symbolSize
symbolSize.descriptionEN: sizes of the start and end symbols of markLine. Half-width (radius) parameters. If the two are the same, number or function can be directly passed in. Same as series' symbolSize.

symbolRotate.descriptionCN: 标线起始和结束的symbol旋转控制，同series中的symbolRotate
symbolRotate.descriptionEN: angles by which the start and end markLine symbols rotate, same as series' symbolRotate.

large.descriptionCN:
是否启用大规模标线模式，默认关闭。
大规模标线模式下会优化标线绘制，同个系列的的所有标线都会使用同一种样式，并且忽略标线两端 symbol 的绘制。
large.descriptionEN:
If enable optimization for large scale markline. Large scale means line number >= 2k.
Optimization will batch lines drawing. Lines of series will force to have same style. And symbols of two end of line will be ignore.

smooth.descriptionCN: 平滑曲线显示，smooth为true时lineStyle不支持虚线
smooth.descriptionEN: smoothed line, while smooth is true, lineStyle.type can not be dashed.

smoothness.descriptionCN: 平滑曲线弧度，smooth为true时有效，指定平滑曲线弧度
smoothness.descriptionEN: Line smoothness. Only available when smooth is true

precision.descriptionCN: 小数精度，使用开箱即用的均线markLine时有效
precision.descriptionEN: precision, use for the average markLine.

bundling.descriptionCN:
边捆绑：
enable 是否使用边捆绑，默认关闭
maxTurningAngle 边捆绑算法参数，可选 [0, 90] 的角度，配置捆绑后的边最大拐角, 默认为 45 度

注：捆绑算法使用 Multilevel Agglomerative Edge Bundling for Visualizing Large Graphs
bundling.descriptionEN:
Edge Bundling

enable: If enable edge bundling.
maxTurningAngle: Max turning angle of bundled edge, ranges from 0 degree to 90 degree.

Tip：Edge bundling use algorithm from "Multilevel Agglomerative Edge Bundling for Visualizing Large Graphs"

enable.descriptionCN: 是否使用边捆绑，默认关闭

maxTurningAngle.descriptionCN: 边捆绑算法参数，可选 [0, 90] 的角度，配置捆绑后的边最大拐角, 默认为 45 度。注：捆绑算法使用 Multilevel Agglomerative Edge Bundling for Visualizing Large Graphs
maxTurningAngle.descriptionEN: maxTurningAngle: Max turning angle of bundled edge, ranges from 0 degree to 90 degree. Tip：Edge bundling use algorithm from "Multilevel Agglomerative Edge Bundling for Visualizing Large Graphs"

effect.descriptionCN:
标线图形炫光特效:
show 是否开启，默认关闭
loop 循环动画，默认开启,
period 运动周期，无单位，值越大越慢，默认为15
scaleSize 放大倍数，以markLine lineWidth为基准
color 炫光颜色，默认跟随markLine itemStyle定义颜色,
shadowColor 光影颜色，默认跟随color
shadowBlur 光影模糊度，默认根据scaleSize计算
百度迁徙（模拟） »
effect.descriptionEN:
glow effect for markLine symbol:

show: specifies whether to show. Defaults to false.
loop: specifies whether to play the animation in a loop. Defaults to true.
period: animation period. No units. The larger the value, the slower. Defaults to 15.
scaleSize: magnification. Based on markLine lineWidth.
color: color of the glow. The default value is pulled from the markLine itemStyle array.
shadowColor: color of the shadow. The default value is pulled from the color array.
shadowBlur: blur degree of shadow. The default value is based on scaleSize.

color.descriptionEN:
color, dominant color, function paramater is
{seriesIndex:x, series:xxx, dataIndex:y, data:yyy}

borderWidth.descriptionEN: width of column border, in px.

barBorderRadius.descriptionCN: 柱形边框圆角，单位px，默认为0，支持传入数组分别指定柱形4个圆角半径，如:[5, 5, 0, 0]（顺时针左上，右上，右下，左下）
barBorderRadius.descriptionEN: radius of bar (column) border, in px, defaults to 0. can be Array to assign a radius to the 4 corners, such as [5, 5, 0, 0](clockwise as left-top, right-top, right-bottom, left-bottom)

barBorderWidth.descriptionCN: 柱形边框线宽，单位px，默认为0
barBorderWidth.descriptionEN: width of bar (column) border, in px, defaults to 0.

label.descriptionCN:
标签，饼图默认显示在外部，离饼图距离由labelLine.length决定，
漏斗图默认显示在右侧，离图形距离由labelLine.length决定
地图标签不可指定位置，
折线图，柱形图，K线图，散点图可指定position见下
label.descriptionEN:
In pie, displayed on the outside by default. labelLine.length controls the label's distance from the pie.
In funnel, displayed on the right by default. labelLine.length controls the label's distance from the funnel.
In map, the location of labels cannot be specified.
position can be specified in line, column, candlestick, scatter. See below.

labelLine.descriptionCN: 标签视觉引导线，默认显示
labelLine.descriptionEN: the visual guide of labels in pie. Defaults to show.

show.descriptionCN: 显示与否
show.descriptionEN: show or not.

show.descriptionCN: 标签显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show label. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标签显示位置。饼图可选为：'outer'（外部） | 'inner'（内部）
oneOf.descriptionEN: Position of label. Value can be 'outer' | 'inner'

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标签显示位置。漏斗图可选为：'inner'（内部）| 'left' | 'right'（默认）
oneOf.descriptionEN: Position of label. Value can be 'inner' | 'left' | 'right'

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标签显示位置。默认根据布局自适应为'top'或者'right'，可选的还有：'inside' | 'left' | 'bottom'
oneOf.descriptionEN: Position of label. The default value is 'top' (for vertical layout) or 'right' (for horizontal layout). Can also be one of: 'inside' | 'left' | 'bottom';

oneOf.descriptionCN: 标签显示位置。默认根据布局自适应为'top'或者'right'，可选的还有：'inside' | 'left' | 'bottom' | 'insideLeft' | 'insideRight' | 'insideTop' | 'insideBottom'
oneOf.descriptionEN: Position of label. The default value is 'top' (for vertical layout) or 'right' (for horizontal layout). Can also be one of: 'inside' | 'left' | 'bottom' | 'insideLeft' | 'insideRight' | 'insideTop' | 'insideBottom'

rotate.descriptionCN: 和弦图有效，文本标签自动旋转
rotate.descriptionEN: applicable to chord. Label rotates automatically.

distance.descriptionCN:
和弦图: 文本标签旋转后于弦的间隔
饼图: 当label position为inner时有效，为label位置到圆心的距离与圆半径(环状图为内外半径和)的比例系数，默认为0.5。
distance.descriptionEN:
In chord, Label's distance from chord after it rotates automatically.
In pie, this distance means the factor of label distance and pie radius(In ring chart, is sum of inner and outer radius), default to 0.5.

formatter.descriptionCN: 标签文本格式器，通用，同Tooltip.formatter，支持模板、方法回调，不支持异步回调
formatter.descriptionEN: label text formatter, universal, same as Tooltip.formatter, Supports template, method callback. Does not support asynchronous callback.

x.descriptionCN: 仅矩形树图使用，标签横坐标
x.descriptionEN: only in treemap，x-coordinate in px of text

y.descriptionCN: 仅矩形树图使用，标签纵坐标
y.descriptionEN: only in treemap，y-coordinate in px of text

show.descriptionCN: 饼图标签视觉引导线显示策略，可选为：true（显示） | false（隐藏）
show.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to show labelLine. Valid values are: true (show) | false (hide).

length.descriptionCN: 线长 ，从图形外边缘起计算，可为负值。漏斗图支持'auto'
length.descriptionEN: length of the line. Starts from the outer edge. Can be negative. In funnel, length can be 'auto'

oneOf.descriptionCN: 颜色
oneOf.descriptionEN: color

oneOf.descriptionEN: it is a two-dimensional array that can be used to divide the gauge axis into several parts, and designate a specific color to each part on this form: [[percent, color value], [...]].

oneOf.descriptionEN: color

oneOf.descriptionEN: color

oneOf.descriptionEN: color

线条样式，可选为：'solid' | 'dotted' | 'dashed'，
                                树图还可以选：'curve' | 'broken'

线条样式，可选为：'solid' | 'dotted' | 'dashed'，

shadowColor.descriptionCN: 折线主线(IE8+)有效，阴影色彩，支持rgba
shadowColor.descriptionEN: applicable to the main line (in IE8+). Color of the shadow. Supports rgba.

shadowBlur.descriptionCN: 折线主线(IE8+)有效，阴影模糊度，大于0有效
shadowBlur.descriptionEN: applicable to the main line (in IE8+). Blur degree of the shadow. Valid values are positive.

shadowOffsetX.descriptionEN: applicable to the main line (in IE8+). Horizontal offset of the shadow. Right when positive, left when negative.

shadowOffsetY.descriptionEN: applicable to the main line (in IE8+). Vertical offset of the shadow. Down when positive, up when negative.

type.descriptionCN: 填充样式，目前仅支持'default'(实填充)
type.descriptionEN: Fill style, currently only supports 'default' (solid fill).

width.descriptionCN: 贝塞尔曲线的线宽, ribbonType是false时有效
width.descriptionEN: Width of bezier curve, Only available when ribbonType is false

color.descriptionCN: 贝塞尔曲线的颜色, ribbonType是false时有效
color.descriptionEN: Color of bezier curve, Only available when ribbonType is false

borderWidth.descriptionCN: ribbon的描边线宽, ribbonType是true时有效
borderWidth.descriptionEN: Border width of ribbon shape, Only available when ribbonType is true

borderColor.descriptionCN: ribbon的描边颜色, ribbonType是true时有效
borderColor.descriptionEN: Border color of ribbon shape, Only available when ribbonType is true

type.descriptionCN: 线条类型，可选为：'curve'（曲线） | 'line'（直线）

oneOf.descriptionCN: 颜色
oneOf.descriptionEN: color

oneOf.descriptionEN: color

oneOf.descriptionCN: 字号 ，单位px
oneOf.descriptionEN: font size, in px.

oneOf.descriptionEN: font size, in px.

oneOf.descriptionCN: 字号，单位px
oneOf.descriptionEN: font size, in px.

text.descriptionEN: The loading text that appears when the chart is set into the loading state. \n' represents a line feed.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'bottom' | 'top' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'bottom' | 'top' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

effect.descriptionCN: loading效果，可选为：'spin' | 'bar' | 'ring' | 'whirling' | 'dynamicLine' | 'bubble'，支持外部装载
effect.descriptionEN: loading effect. Valid values are: 'spin' | 'bar' | 'ring' | 'whirling' | 'dynamicLine' | 'bubble'. Supports external loading.

effectOption.descriptionEN: option for loading effect, see zrender.

progress.descriptionCN: 指定当前进度[0~1]，个别效果有效。
progress.descriptionEN: Specifies the current progress [0~1]. Applicable to specific effects.

text.descriptionEN: The loading text that appears when the chart is set into the loading state. \n' represents a line feed.

x.descriptionCN: 水平安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}（x坐标，单位px）
x.descriptionEN: horizontal position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'left' | 'right' | {number}(x-coordinate, in px).

y.descriptionCN: 垂直安放位置，默认为全图居中，可选为：'center' | 'bottom' | 'top' | {number}（y坐标，单位px）
y.descriptionEN: vertical position. Defaults to center. Valid values are: 'center' | 'bottom' | 'top' | {number}(y-coordinate, in px).

effect.descriptionCN: loading效果，可选为：'spin' | 'bar' | 'ring' | 'whirling' | 'dynamicLine' | 'bubble'，支持外部装载
effect.descriptionEN: loading effect. Valid values are: 'spin' | 'bar' | 'ring' | 'whirling' | 'dynamicLine' | 'bubble'. Supports external loading.

effectOption.descriptionEN: option for loading effect, see zrender.

progress.descriptionCN: 指定当前进度[0~1]，个别效果有效。
progress.descriptionEN: Specifies the current progress [0~1]. Applicable to specific effects.

symbolSize.descriptionCN: 所有该类目的节点的大小

itemStyle.descriptionCN: 详见 itemStyle，注意力导向图单个 category 的 itemStyle 中没有 nodeStyle 的配置项，而是直接使用 normal(emphasis) 下的 color, borderWidth 和 borderColor
itemStyle.descriptionEN: see itemStyle. Notice that itemStyle in thecategory of force has no nodeStyle under the normal(emphasis) option. Instead itemStyle.normal(emphasis).color|borderWidth|borderColor will be used

label.descriptionCN: 节点标签名称，默认显示name作为标签
label.descriptionEN: Label name of the node, name(above) as default.

value.descriptionCN: 节点值，如果不设置会取所有边的权重(weight)和

ignore.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to neglect the node.

itemStyle.descriptionCN: 详见 itemStyle，注意力导向图单个节点的 itemStyle 中没有 nodeStyle 的配置项，而是直接使用 normal(emphasis) 下的 color, borderWidth 和 borderColor
itemStyle.descriptionEN: see itemStyle. Notice that itemStyle in a single node of force has no nodeStyle under the normal(emphasis) option. Instead itemStyle.normal(emphasis).color|borderWidth|borderColor will be used

initial.descriptionCN: 强制指定节点的初始值，在不指定的时候会在某个范围内随机生成
initial.descriptionEN: Forces to specify the initial value of the node. When not specified, it will be randomly generated within a certain range.

fixX.descriptionCN: 是否固定节点在 X 轴上的值，配合 initial 使用
fixX.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to fix the X-value of the node. Works with initial.

fixY.descriptionCN: 是否固定节点在 Y 轴上的值，配合 initial 使用
fixY.descriptionEN: Specifies whether to fix the Y-value of the node. Works with initial.

draggable.descriptionEN: Specifies whether the node is draggable.

source.descriptionCN: 源节点的index或者源节点的name
source.descriptionEN: Index or name of source node

target.descriptionCN: 目标节点的index或者目标节点的name
target.descriptionEN: Index or name of target node
